elJuego.subtitle: Discover everything about the most exciting laser tag experience

whatIs.title: What is Laser Tag?
whatIs.content: Laser tag is a team action game where players use infrared devices to 'tag' other players. It's an exciting experience combining strategy, teamwork, and fun in a safe environment.

howWorks.title: How it works
howWorks.content: Each player receives a vest with sensors and a phaser. The goal is to tag players from the opposing team while avoiding being tagged yourself.

rules.title: Game Rules
rules.content: The rules are simple: respect all players, no running or physical contact, handle equipment with care, follow staff instructions, and above all, have fun!

important.title: Important Information
important.content: Minimum age: 6 years. Groups of 4 to 30 players. Game duration: 10-15 minutes. Equipment included. Comfortable clothing recommended.

elJuego.ctaDesc: Book your game now and experience the thrill of laser tag with friends, family, or colleagues.

questions.q: What is the minimum age to play?
questions.a: Minimum recommended age is 6 years. Children under 8 must be accompanied by an adult.

questions.q: How many people can play at once?
questions.a: Our facilities accommodate 4 to 30 players simultaneously.
Absolutely! Laser tag is completely safe. We use infrared technology with no physical projectiles.

questions.q: What is included in the price?
questions.a: Price includes all necessary equipment, arena access, and full stats.

questions.q: Do I need to book in advance?
questions.a: Yes, we strongly recommend booking in advance.
We recommend comfortable sports clothing. Closed sports shoes are mandatory.

questions.q: Can I bring my own food?
questions.a: Outside food and drink are not allowed in the arena.
